content: **pattern notes** this hat is worked from bottom to top after a short section of 1x1 rib the cable body is worked following the written or chart instructions **skills** -work in the round -knit cables it is not mandatory but it helps to make it easier i have make a small photo tutorial for show how to do the cable stitch **yarn** 2 balls of garnstudio drops cotton merino 50% wool 50% cotton 110 meters / 50 grams color 15 mustard or any dk weight yarn i have spent 60 grams **needles and notions** -3 5 mm circular needle 40cm / 16in for the brim -4 mm circular needle 40cm / 16in for the body of the hat and 4 mm dpns for decrease section or your preferred type for working hat circumference -2 auxiliary needles -1 stitch marker and 9 extra markers to separate chart repeats -tapestry needle -scissors **gauge** 21 sts and 28 rounds to 10cm / 4in over stockinette stitch 24 sts and 28 rounds to 10cm / 4in over cable stitches gauge are after blocking and without stretching the garment using 4 mm needle **size** to fit head 55-60cm / 21-23in circumference **measurements** brim circumference 44cm / 17in length from brim to top 21cm / 8in measurements are after blocking and without stretching the garment
